cost_objection.objection: I can't afford another expense / How much does this cost?
cost_objection.wrong_approach: Our services pay for themselves / You can't afford NOT to hire us
cost_objection.authentic_response: I understand budget concerns—that's exactly why our clients hire us. We work on commission from the media outlets, not as an additional cost to you. Essentially, we're paid from the savings and value we negotiate. In most cases, our clients see 20-40% reduction in media costs in the first 90 days, which more than covers our involvement. Would it help to review your current media spend to show you specifically where we typically find savings?
cost_objection.reframe: This isn't an added expense—it's redirecting money you're already spending, just getting more value for it

control_objection.objection: I don't want to lose control of my advertising decisions
control_objection.wrong_approach: You need to trust us as the experts
control_objection.authentic_response: You shouldn't lose control—that defeats the purpose. Think of us as your media department, not a replacement for your judgment. You make every strategic decision: which channels, what message, what budget. We handle the tactical execution: negotiating rates, managing vendors, tracking performance, and making sure you're not overpaying. You get final approval on every placement. Many clients tell us they actually have MORE control because they finally understand what they're buying and what it costs.
control_objection.reframe: We give you more control through expertise and transparency, not less

relationship_objection.objection: I have good relationships with my current media reps
relationship_objection.wrong_approach: Those reps are just trying to maximize their commission
relationship_objection.authentic_response: Those relationships are valuable, and we're not here to damage them. Here's the reality: your media reps work for their stations, and their job is to sell inventory at the highest rate possible. That's not wrong—it's their role. Our role is different: we work for YOU to get the best value. Often, we maintain those same relationships but negotiate from a position of knowledge and leverage. Your reps may actually prefer working with us because we're efficient, professional, and bring them quality business—just at fair market rates instead of inflated ones.
relationship_objection.reframe: Professional representation improves relationships by making them more efficient and fair

diy_objection.objection: I can negotiate rates myself / I've been doing this for years
diy_objection.wrong_approach: You're not qualified to negotiate like we are
diy_objection.authentic_response: You absolutely can negotiate yourself, and if you've been doing it successfully, that's great. The question is: what's your time worth, and do you know what you don't know? We negotiate media rates 40+ hours per week. We know the actual bottom rates, seasonal patterns, inventory availability, and which stations are desperate for revenue. We know what your competitor paid for the same spot. Can you negotiate? Yes. Can you negotiate as effectively as someone who does this full-time with inside knowledge? That's the real question. Most of our clients were negotiating themselves—they just weren't getting the rates we get.
diy_objection.reframe: It's not about capability, it's about expertise, time, and insider knowledge

results_objection.objection: How do I know this will actually work for my business?
results_objection.wrong_approach: We guarantee results / Everyone sees success
results_objection.authentic_response: Honest answer: you don't know for certain, and anyone who guarantees specific results is being dishonest. What I can tell you: we have [X] years of experience in [MARKET/INDUSTRY], we've negotiated $[X] in media placements, and our average client saves [X]% in the first year while improving their media mix. I can show you case studies from [SIMILAR BUSINESSES] and connect you with current clients. We also structure our agreement so you can [TRIAL PERIOD/EXIT TERMS]. The real question is: are you confident in your current approach, or is there room for improvement?
results_objection.reframe: We can't guarantee outcomes, but we can show proven process and give you a low-risk way to test it

timing_objection.objection: I'm locked into contracts / Now isn't the right time
timing_objection.wrong_approach: You're losing money every day you wait
timing_objection.authentic_response: Actually, now might be the perfect time to start planning. Even if you're mid-contract, we can audit your current agreements, identify what's working and what isn't, and prepare a better strategy for when those contracts expire. We can also often renegotiate existing contracts or find value-adds that improve your current situation. The worst time to plan your media strategy is when you're under pressure at renewal time. Starting now means we're prepared, not scrambling.
timing_objection.reframe: Being in contracts is exactly when you should start planning, not a reason to wait
